name: Desert War 3D - Tactical game
description:
Desert War is a game of military tactics.

Use tactics such as ambushes, division of enemies, sniper handling ...
to achieve victory in various battles against an enemy generally superior in number,
but with intelligence and experience, you can emerge victorious.

You can manage your units from above as in a traditional strategy game,
or enter the unit you decide at any time and manage it yourself.
With a little experience, a unit managed by the player is more effective than one handled by the computer.

Become a desert fox!
